item.title: Kodi
item.description: What is Kodi? Kodi is a piece of software designed to serve as a media center. With third party addons, it can stream media from all over the internet. First Start When you first start Kodi please allow 60-90 seconds before attempting use. How to use Kodi. (content) Todo: Finish this Section
